# Auto-Generated from Robobee
# Authors
# https://github.com/coreos/coreos-kubernetes/blob/master/multi-node/generic/controller-install.sh
#
# /tmp/junit/junit/etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service
[Service]
EnvironmentFile=/tmp/junit/junit/etc/sysconfig/kubelet
Environment=KUBELET_VERSION=${K8S_VER}
Environment=KUBELET_ACI=${HYPERKUBE_IMAGE_REPO}
Environment="RKT_OPTS=--uuid-file-save=${KUBELET_UUID_FILE} \
  --volume dns,kind=host,source=/etc/resolv.conf \
  --mount volume=dns,target=/etc/resolv.conf \
  --volume rkt,kind=host,source=/tmp/junit/junit/usr/local/bin/host-rkt \
  --mount volume=rkt,target=/usr/bin/rkt \
  --volume var-lib-rkt,kind=host,source=/var/lib/rkt \
  --mount volume=var-lib-rkt,target=/var/lib/rkt \
  --volume stage,kind=host,source=/tmp \
  --mount volume=stage,target=/tmp \
  --volume var-log,kind=host,source=/var/log \
  --mount volume=var-log,target=/var/log \
  ${CALICO_OPTS}"
ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/mkdir -p /tmp/junit/junit/etc/kubernetes/manifests
ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/mkdir -p /tmp/junit/junit/opt/cni/bin
ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/mkdir -p /tmp/junit/junit/var/log/containers
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/rkt rm --uuid-file=${KUBELET_UUID_FILE}
ExecStart=/usr/lib/coreos/kubelet-wrapper \
  --api-servers=${K8S_APISERVERS} \
  --register-schedulable=false \
  --cni-conf-dir=/tmp/junit/junit/etc/kubernetes/cni/net.d \
  --network-plugin=cni \
  --container-runtime=${CONTAINER_RUNTIME} \
  --rkt-path=/usr/bin/rkt \
  --rkt-stage1-image=coreos.com/rkt/stage1-coreos \
  --allow-privileged=true \
  --pod-manifest-path=/tmp/junit/junit/etc/kubernetes/manifests \
  --hostname-override=${ADVERTISE_IP} \
  --cluster_dns=${DNS_SERVICE_IP} \
  --cluster_domain=cluster.local
ExecStop=-/usr/bin/rkt stop --uuid-file=${KUBELET_UUID_FILE}
Restart=always
RestartSec=10

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
